casebody.data:
136 FIELD POINT CIRCLE HOLDING COMPANY, LLC
v.
Alexander RAZINSKI et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 7, 2018

Joseph DaSilva, Jr., and Marc J. Grenier, in support of the petition.

Stephen G. Walko and Andrea C. Sisca, in opposition.

The defendant Xenia Razinski's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 41535) is denied.
